state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to move north. And then, try to go west. And then, head north. With that over with, take a trip east. Then, make an effort to take a trip east. Then, make an attempt to venture east. Then, move east. Following that, make an attempt to go north. Okay, and then, make an attempt to go to the east. If you can manage that, take a trip south. And then, make an attempt to go west. With that accomplished, head west. Then, venture south. And then, go to the west. With that over with, lift the coin from the floor of the studio. Got that?
